Problem 63
13 February 2004

The 5-digit number, 16807=75, is also a fifth power. Similarly, the 9-digit number, 134217728=89, is a ninth power.

How many n-digit positive integers exist which are also an nth power?

ANSWER
shabunc$ ./compute.lua 
1   9   1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9
2   6   16 25 36 49 64 81
3   5   125 216 343 512 729
4   4   1296 2401 4096 6561
5   3   16807 32768 59049
6   3   117649 262144 531441
7   2   2097152 4782969
8   2   16777216 43046721
9   2   134217728 387420489
10  2   1073741824 3486784401
11  1   31381059609
12  1   282429536481
13  1   2541865828329
14  1   22876792454961
15  1   2.0589113209465e+14
16  1   1.8530201888518e+15
17  1   1.6677181699667e+16
18  1   1.50094635297e+17
19  1   1.350851717673e+18
20  1   1.2157665459057e+19
21  1   1.0941898913151e+20
TOTAL   49
